resources.string: Now you can close this app and (if needed) all newly incoming SMS will be adjusted automatically.
SmsFailFix forces Android to use only the Service Center number configured in your phone to deliver all your outgoing SMS.
After running it the first time, it is started automatically during SMS reception.
The only way to disable it is to uninstall it.
This work is licensed under the terms of the GNU GPL, version 2.
